settings.title: Meraki Ã— Dark Horse
settings.description:
Founded in a small San Diego neighborhood in California, USA, in 2013, Dark Horse has grown from a local cold brew bar into a well-loved roastery with locations across San Diego and Kauai, Hawaii. Throughout this journey, they have remained true to their roots by focusing on quality, transparency, and care.

Dark Horse builds close, long-term relationships with smallholder farmers around the world. Their commitment to direct trade sourcing is guided by trust, accountability, and a deep respect for every hand involved in the process. From origin to cup, their coffees reflect intention and craftsmanship.

We are excited to feature Dark Horse as a CoffeeSenseâ„¢ Partner. Paired with the precision of Meraki machines, their roasts come to life exactly as intended, offering an experience that feels as honest as it tastes.
